context: hello im great im into horros and comedies do you have any suggestions
Yes! Have you seen Evil Dead or Evil Dead II (1987) ? Those are horror and comedy in one1
I have no seen either, are they worth the time?
They are really great! Pretty cheesy, but some good horror effects. Army of Darkness (1992) is good too!
The last comedy i saw was Girls Trip (2017) was great
resp: And Shaun of the Dead (2004) is my favorite horror comedy! Super funny and gory.
